doc.title: Zeitungsreise
doc.plot: In 1913 a farmer finds a strange looking newspaper from the future lying on his ground. He picks it up and starts to read, when the world around him suddenly starts to change and Angela Merkel, the German canceler stands right beside him. He is flabbergasted with surprise and turns another page, and in this very moment the politician disappears and three's a bunny competition on the field with dozens of rabbits around his feet. Again he turns the page an this time three's a whole soccer-team fighting for the ball. Then his wife arrives...
